user_query: I'm developing a social media analytics tool and I need to collect user data. Can you provide me with the followers and followings of a specific user with ID '2455740283'? Additionally, I would like to retrieve the tweets posted by this user.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the followers of the user with ID '2455740283'.
Retrieve the followings of the user with ID '2455740283'.
Retrieve the tweets posted by the user with ID '2455740283'.
